devdoc.author: Venus
devdoc.details: The Undertaker contract is responsible for pausing and unlisting markets in a permissionless manner, without requiring additional VIP approvals.

params.canUnlist: If the market can be unlisted after being paused.
params.toBePausedAfterTimestamp: The timestamp after which the market can be paused.
params.toBeUnlistedMinTotalSupplyUSD: The minimum total market supply (in USD) required to keep the market listed.

params.market: The address of the market that was paused.
The address of the market that was unlisted.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

returns._0: True if the markets total deposits are below the global threshold and it is not already paused.
True if the market is paused and the current block timestamp is greater than `marketExpiry()`.
True if the market is paused

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pauseMarket(address).custom:error: MarketNotEligibleForPause Thrown if the market is not eligible for pausing.

params.market: The address of the market to pause.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setGlobalDepositThreshold(uint256).details: Restricted to governance (VIP).      Defines the minimum deposit level required to keep a market active.

setMarketExpiry(address,uint256,bool,uin.custom:error: MarketNotListed Thrown if the market is not listed.InvalidExpiryConfiguration Thrown if the configuration is invalid.

params.canUnlist: If the market can be unlisted after being paused.
params.toBePausedAfterTimestamp: The timestamp after which the market can be paused.
params.toBeUnlistedMinTotalSupplyUSD: The minimum total market supply (in USD) required to keep the market listed.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

unlistMarket(address).custom:error: MarketNotEligibleForUnlisting Thrown if the market is not eligible for unlisting.

params.market: The address of the market to unlist.

globalDepositThreshold.details: If a markets deposits fall below this threshold, it can be paused.

devdoc.title: Undertaker

InvalidExpiryConfiguration().notice: Thrown when the expiry configuration provided is invalid.

MarketNotEligibleForPause().notice: Thrown when attempting to pause a market that is not eligible.

MarketNotEligibleForUnlisting().notice: Thrown when attempting to unlist a market that is not eligible.

MarketNotListed().notice: Thrown when the market is not listed.

GlobalDepositThresholdUpdated(uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when the global deposit threshold is updated.

MarketExpiryUpdated(address,uint256,bool.notice: Emitted when the expiry configuration for a market is updated.

MarketPaused(address).notice: Emitted when a market is paused.

MarketUnlisted(address).notice: Emitted when a market is unlisted.

canPauseMarket(address).notice: Checks if a market can currently be paused.

canUnlistMarket(address).notice: Checks if a market can currently be unlisted.

expiries(address).notice: Mapping to store expiry configurations for markets.

isMarketPaused(address).notice: Checks if a market is currently paused.

pauseMarket(address).notice: Pauses a market if the criteria are met.

setGlobalDepositThreshold(uint256).notice: Updates the global deposit threshold (in USD).

setMarketExpiry(address,uint256,bool,uin.notice: Sets the expiry configuration for a market.

unlistMarket(address).notice: Unlists a market if the criteria are met.
